scripts.deploy:win: node -e "const dateTime = require('moment')().format('YYYYMMDD-HHmmss'); require('child_process').execSync(`git tag -f rel-${dateTime} && git push -f --tags`, { stdio: [0, 1, 2]} );"
scripts.deploy:master: git checkout master && git pull origin master --ff-only && git merge develop && git push origin master && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:win:master: git checkout master && git pull origin master --ff-only && git merge develop && git push origin master && npm run deploy:win && git checkout develop
